title: Building SkiaSharp needs mono on Linux?
body:
When following the README I get this error:

    $ ./bootstrapper.sh -t everything
    using local cake.packages.config...
    Downloading NuGet...
    ./bootstrapper.sh: line 93: mono: command not found
    Could not restore NuGet tools.

I have .NET Core 2.0 installed. I'm running CentOS 7
